member.name: T:XaeiOS.TestSuite.Tests.DictionaryRemoveSSABugTest
member.summary:
Test fix for bug in XaeiO.Compiler2 where SSA form was not being generated correctly.
The bug was that phi nodes were not being placed at all the proper locations.

member.name: M:XaeiOS.TestSuite.Tests.DictionaryRemoveSSABugTest.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: This method used to run forever because of the bug

member.name: M:XaeiOS.TestSuite.Tests.DomTest.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: A test for the Document Object Model interfaces available in XaeiOS. DOM element resources are automatically freed when the SIP exits.
member.param: The number of seconds the animations in the test should run for
